p: Several studies with SARS‐CoV anti‐spike S‐protein antisera tested in cell lines or in laboratory animals indicate ADE ( 31, 32, 33). Furthermore, the immune response and production of anti‐spike NAbs are accelerated in patients with fatal outcome ( 42, 43). In addition, enhancement of viral uptake dependent on RBD specific NAbs as well as on FcγRII is reported in vitro in MERS‐CoV ( 24, 30).
